backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing the MediClear backend with CRUD operations for medical report records, including submit, getSummary, getHistory, toggleBookmark, and deleteReport functions using an in-memory Map store.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report confirming that the app logo replacement (using app-logo.dim_256x256.png) was implemented in AppHeader.tsx and SplashScreen.tsx with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-sentence summaries of all frontend source files, serving as a reference index for the MediClear app's frontend codebase.
frontend/index.css: Minimal Tailwind CSS entry file that defines OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark color themes used throughout the app.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the MediClear PWA with mobile viewport settings, theme color, apple-mobile-web-app meta tags, and font preconnect links.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with four routes (splash, input, results, history) and a root layout that includes a Sonner Toaster for global toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Sticky app header component with the MediClear logo image, dynamic title, and conditional back/history/new navigation buttons styled with a gradient.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Layout wrapper that composes AppHeader with a flexible main content area, supporting optional header visibility and consistent mobile padding.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP actor, invalidating dependent queries whenever the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useFontSize.ts: Custom hook managing a small/medium/large font size preference persisted in localStorage, returning the current size, setter, and Tailwind CSS class maps.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider context and useInternetIdentity hook for managing DFINITY AuthClient login, logout, and identity state across the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useLanguage.ts: Custom React hook that manages the app's UI language, persisting the selection to localStorage and exposing the current translation object.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for all backend interactions: fetching history, fetching a single summary, submitting reports, toggling bookmarks, and deleting reports.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Defines the Translations interface and a full translations record for six languages (en, hi, es, fr, ar, bn) covering all UI strings in the app.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports fonts, configures Tailwind, defines CSS custom properties for light/dark medical teal-green themes, and adds utility/component classes and animations.
frontend/src/lib/medicalSimplifier.ts: Contains a large medical-term glossary and utility logic to translate medical jargon into plain-language equivalents for patient-facing report simplification.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with React Query, Internet Identity, and the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryScreen.tsx: History page component that lists past reports with search, favourites filtering, delete confirmation dialogs, and navigation to individual report views.
frontend/src/pages/InputScreen.tsx: React page that provides two textarea inputs for pasting lab reports and prescriptions, runs client-side simplification, submits the result via a mutation, and navigates to the results screen.
frontend/src/pages/ResultsScreen.tsx: React page that fetches and displays a simplified medical summary (key findings, medications, action steps) with tabs, multi-language support, bookmark/copy/share functionality, and persists original input texts via localStorage.
frontend/src/pages/SplashScreen.tsx: Animated splash screen shown on app launch that displays the MediClear logo and branding, then auto-navigates to the input screen after ~2.8 seconds.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color tokens (using oklch), typography, border radius, font families, and enabling dark mode, typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata tracking MediClear's version, existing features, and a pending action request (AR-1) to replace the app logo with a newly uploaded image.
